channel.title: My client will temp ban people plz help!
channel.description:
OK so i'm using Acrylicx Client and when im coding or sometimes just whenever people might lag or relog or even just getting a password wrong with make the server reject the person and this is what it says. [code]BANNING HOST IpAddress (flooding) ClientHandler: Rejected (IpAddress):1894 ClientHandler: Rejected (Ipaddress):1895[/code]
I think its the Clients login screen b/c it does not have the info / login thing like this - [img]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/17/03/00/30/info_l10.jpg[/img]
It has it like this - ( Just goes to this auto ) [img]http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/17/03/00/30/login_10.jpg[/img]
IF this is not why then if you know please tell me
Also If you can help me i would really like that + if u want i can make u a Donner on my server. not sure if you want that but i'm working on giving doners allot.
Thanks =D
